name: ruTorrent
longDescription: ruTorrent is a popular web-based front-end for the rTorrent BitTorrent client. It provides a feature-rich and user-friendly interface for managing torrents directly from your browser. With support for multiple plugins, RSS feeds, file management, and detailed statistics, ruTorrent offers a complete torrent management solution. The application is highly customizable and perfect for users who want a powerful, self-hosted torrent client with remote access capabilities.
description: A powerful web-based front-end for rTorrent BitTorrent client with plugin support and remote management
